mapper.insert: insert into todaywork(no, todaywork_title, todaywork_contents, regdate, employee_no, successed) values(my_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, #{empNo}, 'N')
mapper.select: select no as no, todaywork_title as title, todaywork_contents as contents, regdate as regdate, employee_no as empNo, successed as successed from todaywork where employee_no = #{value} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select no as no, todaywork_title as title, todaywork_contents as contents, regdate as regdate, employee_no as empNo, successed as successed from todaywork where employee_no = #{empNo} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(#{regdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select rank, no as no, todaywork_title as title, todaywork_contents as contents, regdate as regdate, employee_no as empNo, successed as successed from (select row_number() over(order by regdate desc) as rank, no, todaywork_title, todaywork_contents, regdate, employee_no, successed from todaywork where employee_no = #{value} and to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(#{regdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) where rank <= 5
